title: Mistery Gift On New Client
body: I opened league and it was saying that i got a mistery gift,i tried to open it but it didn't work.I looked at all my champions and i didn't found something.Was it a bug or ?

replies.body: Toast notifications were enabled for testing on the updated client, per the current [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002024567--Jan-26-Click-here-if-you-are-getting-notifications-about-receiving-gifts-in-the-updated-client-).  Nothing new here, just a backlog of old stuff that you've already received.  Let me know if that clears things up!
